text: Yuri Nikolaevich Klepikov (; 24 August 1935 – 1 November 2021) was a Russian screenwriter and actor.Ушёл из жизни драматург Юрий Клепиков His career began in 1966. A screenwriter, he was known for his works in The Story of Asya Klyachina (1966), The Seventh Companion (1967), Mama Married (1969), Dauria (1971), The Ascent (1976) and Boys (1983). ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Russian screenwriters Category:Russian movie actors
title: Yuri Klepikov
